feature.label: Our Strategy
feature.title: Unify clouds, processes, and tools in one place
feature.description: Quickly connect your infrastructure, manage deployments, performance, and cost

card1.title: Accelerate Onboarding
card1.description: Centralize software, APIs, resources, and teams in one place. Optimize your team's onboarding time and keep all documentation centralized.

card2.title: Configure your platform
card2.description: Deploy securely and consistently using Templates. Test faster and more consistently. Track metrics, identify bottlenecks, and maintain high-quality delivery.

card3.title: Count on our support
card3.description: Whether you are running on your own cloud instance or in your datacenter, we help you configure the platform according to your needs.

benefits.title: Take your code to a new level of efficiency with VeeCode Platform

card1.title: API Catalogs
card1.description: Access a wide range of resources and create innovative applications.

card2.title: Software Templates
card2.description: Simplify the creation process and accelerate application development.

card3.title: Observability Dashboards
card3.description: Monitor and analyze the performance of your applications.

card4.title: Platform Engineering
card4.description: Build high-quality products efficiently and collaboratively in a robust environment.

card5.title: API Management
card5.description: Manage, monitor, and optimize your APIs effectively with the ideal tools.

testimonial-card1.quote: VeeCode has become an essential tool in our company. We accelerated our deliveries with a significant reduction in time and, more importantly, maintained observability between teams.
testimonial-card1.author: Gabriel

testimonial-card2.quote: VeeCode was a pleasant surprise! We accelerated the delivery of new environments by 90%, all with a very high standard of security and governance, and great cost-benefit, which was essential in choosing the tool.
testimonial-card2.author: Geraldo

call-to-action.title: Increase your team's visibility and alignment

card1.title: API Catalog
card1.description: Devportal by VeeCode Platform is the ideal platform to centralize and catalog your APIs efficiently. With Devportal, you can view, test, and manage all your APIs in one place while also accessing the documentation and plugins needed to develop your project, app, or feature.

card2.title: Software Templates
card2.description: With Devportal, you can customize your environment with development and infrastructure templates, as well as have the freedom to personalize pipelines. The platform offers a variety of pre-configured templates that speed up the development process and ensure consistency in your product.

card3.title: Kong Service Manager
card3.description: Manage and administer information about Kong services. List and manipulate routes, manage plugins without leaving the DevPortal. Access details of services and APIs.

card4.title: VeeCode Docs
card4.description: Centralize all documentation in one place. VeeCode searches for documentation in all repositories and gathers all entries in your DevPortal, allowing broad and organized access.

card5.title: VeeCode RBAC
card5.description: VeeCode RBAC allows you to configure the access you need to ensure customized permissions. Select who can or cannot view items, perform tasks, or make changes, ensuring only relevant and pertinent information is shown to each user type.

hero.title: Reach new levels of efficiency
hero.description: Count on VeeCode Platform to scale your business

card1.title: Unlimited Testing
card1.description: Count on our team of qualified professionals to help you maximize the use of our products and tools. We are here to answer questions about installation, configuration, and usage, considering your workflow. Report any errors you encounter and their impact so we can fix them and prevent future issues.

card2.title: Launch Workshop
card2.description: Platform Engineering facilitates cloud migration by providing information, knowledge, and a strategic plan. The workshop explores the principles, benefits, and role of platform engineering, enabling participants to create a personalized strategic roadmap. By the end, they will have the knowledge to confidently launch their Internal Developer Portal.

card3.title: Fast Track
card3.description: VeeCode Fast Track offers a specialized IDP solution to quickly improve the developer experience. Through a time-bound effort, a dedicated team quickly sets up a DevPortal instance and provides initial templates and automations for immediate productivity gains.

pricing.title: Choose the support that best fits your needs:

resources.title: VeeCode Plugins
resources.description: Access descriptions, guides, and installation instructions for our plugins

github-workflows.description: The Github Workflows plugin provides an alternative to manually trigger GitHub workflows within your Backstage component.

gitlab-pipelines.description: The Gitlab Pipelines plugin integrates GitlabCi into your Backstage component in a simple way.

kong-service-manager.description: The Kong Service Manager plugin provides information about the Kong service, a list of associated routes, and also allows you to manage plugins without leaving Backstage.

kubernetes-gpt-analyzer.description: The Kubernetes GPT Analyzer plugin uses artificial intelligence with the help of the k8s-operator to analyze and optimize your Kubernetes entities, improving cluster management and performance. It facilitates anomaly detection and suggests best practices.

infracost.description: The Infracost plugin works together with Terraform and provides a graphical representation and cost estimates for your entity in the respective provider.
